Co-founder and graphic designer for www.bookingbug.com.

Gregâ€™s background as a graphic designer and long-time web developer are the perfect complement to Glennâ€™s technical skills. With 10 plus years of US-based experience stretching from the West Coast to the Mid-West. His history working for high-profile corporate clients to teaching at the university level adds an affluence of “front end” information . Greg specializes in immersive interactive web experiences and learning media. With clients history ranging from Compaq to Sony to Kellogg’s Poptarts Greg decided to join Glenn, and help make BookingBug’s robust engine easier to understand with clearer graphics and a sexier UI.
